column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The restaurant itself was fairly busy which is great for a Monday night
column2: so my friend and I sat down at the bar. I tried the Passion Fruit Sangria which was pretty awesome. The bartender told me their specialty was the Mango Sangria
column3: but I'm not one for Mango..so if you are you should get on that. Next drink wise I had a mean margarita. It was delish.
